name: RE-WIND (Raphlette)
description:
RE-WIND

Plot:

Welcome in RE-WIND,

In this game you will be in charge of a RE-WIND Corp's Paper Plane equipped with a prodigious ability of rewinding the wind. 
If the wind lifts you forward through the levels, times will come where you will need to use your re-wind power and pray for the wind to lift you back. Indeed, as a paper plane even the smallest collision with the smallest cloud will be fatal ! 

Prepare yourself to prove that you are the best pilot of RE-WIND Corp's and complete all the "always more challenging" levels.

ADVICE NOTICE

You are stuck on a level ? This notice will guide through the difficult parts of each level !

Level 1:  Introduction
"Nothing to declare Sir !" If you are stuck on left right mechanics I can't do anything for you.

Level 2:  Introduction to Re-wind mechanics
The difficult part of this level resides in its end. You learn the Re-wind mechanism and how to repeat it multiple times in a row. 

For this I'd advice to go to the last mill, grab it and then go up a little as shown below, before activating your re-wind ability. It should help you go down to the perfect spot from where you could go left.

Level 3:  Sky is the limit
Once again I would say that the difficulty of this level is in its end. You have to re-wind multiple time and the last path is not that big. 

To pass this part easily with (almost) 100% success rate, get to the second to last mill with a re-wind and then dose the right key input to drive nicely through the path to the end zone.   

Level 4: Storm is coming
Okay I admit it, this one is a bitch. The main difficulty of this level is tricky. You passed your first moving clouds and you start to see the next checkpoint but the path to get to it is quite small and you bump into something each time. 
Well my solution is.. Don't try to reach for the mill ! You can pass directly inside the path by positioning yourself as shown bellow and press the left input key. Works for me every time ! The level should feel easier :)

Level 5:  The end is nigh

Here it is for the advice note !
Don't hesitate to tell me if there are other moments where you can't go through, I'll edit this guide to add  additional explanations !

Easy Controls:

Left/Right: Move
Space: Re-wind
Escape : Pause menu

Note:

This game was completely made during the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2. 
It is my first ever finished game, and I am proud of what I learnt during this week.
